Class PasswordValidator

java.lang.Object
com.sc2002.utilities.PasswordValidator
public class PasswordValidator extends Object
Utility class for validating password complexity requirements.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type

  • Constructor Details

      public PasswordValidator()
      Default constructor for PasswordValidator. As this class only contains static methods, instantiation is generally not needed.

  • Method Details

    • isValid

      public static boolean isValid(String password)
      Validates a password against predefined security criteria. Criteria: 1. Must be at least MIN_LENGTH (8) characters long. 2. Must contain at least one special character (from SPECIAL_CHARACTERS). 3. Must contain at least one uppercase letter. 4. Must contain at least one lowercase letter. 5. Must contain at least one digit.
      Parameters:
      password - The password string to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the password meets all criteria, false otherwise.

    • getValidationMessages

      public static List<String> getValidationMessages(String password)
      Validates a password and returns a list of messages for unmet criteria. This provides more detailed feedback than the simple isValid method.
      Parameters:
      password - The password string to validate.
      Returns:
      A list of strings describing the unmet criteria. An empty list means the password is valid.
